Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory717.jpg'}
{3: 'Feeling a bit drowsy on a lazy afternoon, I head to my room to get some instant coffee.'}
{3: 'Opening the door, I see a chair covered with a piece of silk cloth.'}
{3: "Except you don't remember having bought this and wonder if it's something you got as a gift from someone..."}
{3: 'When you lift the silk cloth, though, you see a neatly crafted four-legged wooden chair.'}
{2: "Would have been great if it'd come with a cushion...", 3: '8'}
{2: '???', 3: "Well, you'd end up ruining your spine if you sit on a cushioned chair for too long, though."}
{3: 'Turning around, you see Qu standing behind you. I never expected her to show up here.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Qu', 3: "Thought I'd drop by because it's a special day.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: "Happy Birthday, Commandant. Been a while since we last met. I see you've changed quite a bit.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: "I got that chair over there for you as a birthday gift. I mean, it's pretty common and all...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: "Oh, but it's made of high-quality rosewood, which is rare nowadays.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Thank you, Qu.', 3: '18'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: "Don't mention it.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'So? Want to try sitting down and see how it feels?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'With Qu watching you, you slowly sit down on the rosewood chair.'}
{3: "With it, you seem to smell a faint fragrance of sun-dried chocolate, and you don't know if it's all just in your head."}
{3: "The curve of the chair's back is an ergonomic design and feels just right."}
{3: "Right when you're savoring the moment, a pair of hands find their way up your neck..."}
{3: 'The cold fingers catch you by surprise.'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'So? How do you like it?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'It feels comfy.', 3: '29'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: "It's your special day. Do you have any requests?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'A shoulder rub?', 3: '31'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'A shoulder rub, huh? A bold request that is.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Qu places her hands on your shoulders awkwardly... before you start hearing cracks.'}
{3: 'A sharp pain shoots through the gaps between your shoulder blades and collarbone.'}
{2: 'Ouch, ouch, ouch!', 3: '36', 4: 'Okay, okay, okay. It feels great.', 5: '37'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: "Does it hurt that much? I didn't even apply any force.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'Your face says otherwise, though.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Have you never massaged anyone?', 3: '39'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: "Wait, me? C'mon, it's always been the other way around.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'Perfect chance for me to get familiar with it, I think.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'So be good and work with me here, yeah?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'This is gonna end up killing me.', 3: '43', 4: 'Stop, stop, stop.', 5: '43'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: "Just kidding. Let's call it a day here.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: "Drop by Kowloong sometime and I'll get you a professional chiropractor.", 4: '1'}
